Dwarf

  • Ceres

    Ceres is the largest asteroid and the only dwarf planet in the inner Solar System.

  • Makemake

    Makemake is a dwarf planet and perhaps the largest Kuiper belt object.

  • Pluto

    Pluto is a large trans-Neptunian object in the Kuiper belt; the second-most-massive dwarf planet known in the Solar System.
